title: One of a team of four
desc: Some of this message may be hard to interpret

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
I've got a wee 
 cashy coming up

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
Gonna ride around on a 
 red horse with a great sword, 
 taking peace from the Earth
